SEARCH
Package com.microdiab.mrisk.exception

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
com.microdiab.mrisk.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware
@RestControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for mRisk application. This class uses Spring's RestControllerAdvice to centralize exception handling across all controllers. It maps specific exceptions to appropriate HTTP responses and ensures consistent error formatting.

  • Field Summary
